author: fern
description:
Use code 'FERNTV' to get 60% off an annual plan https://incogni.com/ferntv and take control of your personal data (ad)

Thanks to Scott Payne and Michelle Shepard for your valuable insights!

The majority of this video is based on Scott Payne’s book and podcast:
White Hot Hate - Agent Pale Horse: https://www.cbc.ca/listen/cbc-podcasts/1031-white-hot-hate
Code Name - Pale Horse: https://www.simonandschuster.com/books/Code-Name-Pale-Horse/Scott-Payne/9781668032909

This is the story of Scott Payne, the redneck turned FBI agent who infiltrated America’s underbelly. 


Sources: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1cR1oe1Uxo7EiDznzppgjpAVqo_4uni28txnDAsEfXb4/edit?usp=sharing

title: How an FBI Agent Infiltrated the KKK
